recipesJson.name: Sweet Georgia Lemonade
recipesJson.author: XxBulldogIrishxX
recipesJson.description: A sweet Peach lemonade.. Tried a few different things and this way tasted best to me!  I love the peach flavors for summer time!

reviews.text: Being from GA and seeing it in the name of the recipe I had to give this a mix. I am not a huge fan of sweet juices so i used 0.25% of Super Sweet and 0.25% of WS-23 is the most of that stuff I can handle and taste anything other than coldness. The addition of Sour and FA Lemon to the LA Lemonade really helped it taste more like a natural lemonade, and the FA White Peach comes through just fine and isnâ€™t giving me any harshness after a 7 day steep.
